mapper.select: SELECT * FROM content_key ORDER BY content_priority

SELECT ifnull(c.content_key_id,"0") AS content_key_id , ifnull(c.content_key,"暂无") AS content_key, p.process_key_id AS process_key_id, p.process_key AS process_key,p.reason AS reason, p.process_priority AS process_priority FROM process_key AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN content_key AS c ON p.content_key_id=c.content_key_id ORDER BY c.content_key_id,p.process_priority

SELECT ifnull(c.content_key_id,"0") AS content_key_id , ifnull(c.content_key,"暂无") AS content_key, p.process_key_id AS process_key_id, p.process_key AS process_key,p.reason AS reason, p.process_priority AS process_priority FROM process_key AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN content_key AS c ON p.content_key_id=c.content_key_id WHERE c.content_key LIKE '%${content_key}%' ORDER BY c.content_key_id,p.process_priority

SELECT ifnull(c.content_key_id,"0") AS content_key_id , ifnull(c.content_key,"暂无") AS content_key, p.process_key_id AS process_key_id, p.process_key AS process_key,p.reason AS reason, p.process_priority AS process_priority FROM process_key AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN content_key AS c ON p.content_key_id=c.content_key_id WHERE p.process_key LIKE '%${process_key}%' ORDER BY c.content_key_id,p.process_priority

SELECT ifnull(c.content_key_id,"0") AS content_key_id , ifnull(c.content_key,"暂无") AS content_key, p.process_key_id AS process_key_id, p.process_key AS process_key,p.reason AS reason, p.process_priority AS process_priority FROM process_key AS p LEFT OUTER JOIN content_key AS c ON p.content_key_id=c.content_key_id WHERE p.process_key LIKE '%${process_key}%' AND c.content_key LIKE '%${content_key}%' ORDER BY c.content_key_id,p.process_priority
